p: The essential oil from Artemisia argyi (AAEO) [ 38] can inhibit the release of inflammatory mediators (NO and PGE2) and the expression of cytokines (IL-6, IFN- Î², IL-10, and MCP-1). AAEO inhibited the expression of iNOS and COX-2 at the transcription level without affecting its activity [ 39]. Moreover, AAEO also inhibited the phosphorylation of STAT1 (Tyr701) and STAT3 (Tyr705) and downregulated JAK/STAT signalling and ROS scavenging. ROS production plays a key role in the activation of JAK/STATs in macrophages. According to a previous report, essential oils scavenging ROS have antioxidant activity; therefore, the inhibitory effect of AAEO on JAK/STAT may be due to its antioxidant activity, especially its effect on ROS production [ 14, 40].
